issue.title: [CF 1611] Combat event source/destination conditions fucky?
issue.body:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scleu ^SSourceUnit^Sarena1-3 ^SCLEUDur^N10 ^SName^SMind~`Freeze:~`3;~`Pummel:~`4;~`Kick:~`5;~`Wind~`Shear:~`3;~`Skull~`Bash:~`4;~`Counterspell:~`6;~`Spell~`Lock:~`6;~`Counter~`Shot:~`3;~`Spear~`Hand~`Strike:~`4;~`Solar~`Beam:~`6;~`Rebuke:~`4;~`Disrupt:~`3;~`Muzzle:~`3;~`Optical~`Blast:~`6 ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SGUID^STMW:icon:1RtddVERetiD ^SDestUnit^Sparty1-2 ^SEnabled^B ^SDestConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SROLE2 ^SBitFlags^T ^SHEALER^B ^t^t^N2^T ^SType^SMANA_MAX ^SOperator^S> ^SLevel^N99999 ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_INTERRUPT_SPELL^B ^t^t^N85504^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

 

Sometimes I see this aura triggered when my teammate (not the healer) gets kicked. No clue why this happens, as the destination conditions should invalidate a dps from being tracked?


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1611 | Raw

comments.body:
I... uhh... yeah.

 

The destination conditions have literally never worked correctly for as long as that feature has existed (conditions on CLEU source/dest units)

 

https://github.com/ascott18/TellMeWhen/commit/5b8f6470888f973a9ccc059d2c644c8dcfaea1f1#diff-bdeb5adb779111497b2f0b260922ea49R498

 

 

Uh huh. Good job, me.

Edited Nov 15, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
